content.en: CMOS circuit optimization: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to optimize the performance of CMOS logic circuits. These algorithms, such as multiobjective gate level optimization and gate sizing algorithms, aim to improve factors like power consumption, delay, and area optimization. By using techniques like heuristic algorithms, iterative remapping, and convex optimization, these algorithms help in achieving efficient and intelligent compromise between different criteria in the design of CMOS circuits.
content.da: CMOS-kredsløbsoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at optimere ydeevnen af CMOS logiske kredsløb. Disse algoritmer, såsom multiobjekt gate-niveau optimering og gate-størrelsesalgoritmer, sigter mod at forbedre faktorer som strømforbrug, forsinkelse og arealoptimering. Ved at anvende teknikker som heuristiske algoritmer, iterativ omkortlægning og konveks optimering hjælper disse algoritmer med at opnå en effektiv og intelligent balance mellem forskellige kriterier i designet af CMOS-kredsløb.
